pros: Oxfam is a leading recruitment company that is more credible

review_title: HR is the source of all issues
pros:
- Great vision and team.
- Accommodation facilities and interest in employees' wellbeing.
- Great regional and international support.
cons:
- HR lacks transparency in terms of salary ranges and job expectations. 
- HR picks favorites and makes the lives of others hard by spreading rumors and enforcing certain policies (which are otherwise not enforced on all employees).
